subject: Baseball
Credit and Debt
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Dodgers owner Frank McCourt accused Commissioner Bud Selig of causing the team’s financial distress by not approving a pending local television deal with Fox.
snippet: Dodgers owner Frank McCourt accused Commissioner Bud Selig of causing the team’s financial distress by not approving a pending local television deal with Fox.
